#Text=Recite the Fire Nation oath .

#Text= Class says : " My life I give to my country , with my hands I fight for Fire Lord Ozai and our forefathers before him .

column1: #Text=" Aang says : " Fire Lord ... forefathers ... " Class says : " With my mind I seek ways to better my country , and with my feet may our March of Civilization continue .
#Text=" Aang says : " Firebenders ... Fire Lord ... wah , bah , blah , blah .
#Text=" Kwan says : " Since it 's obviously hilarious to mock our national oath , we 'll begin with a pop quiz on our great March of Civilization .
#Text=Question one : What year did Fire Lord Sozin battle the Air Nation army ?
#Text=Kuzon ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Is that a trick question ?
#Text=The Air Nomads did n't have a formal military .
#Text=Sozin defeated them by ambush .
#Text=" Kwan says : " Well , I do n't know how you could possibly know more than our national history book .
#Text=Unless you were there a hundred years ago .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll just write down my best guess .
#Text=" Music teacher says : " Kuzon ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I know , I 'm a terrible tsungi hornist .
#Text=" Music teacher says : " No , child .
#Text=That hullabaloo going on with your feet .
#Text=Is that a nervous disorder ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I was just dancing .
#Text=You do dances here in the homeland , right ?
#Text=" Shoji says : " Not really , no .
#Text=" Music teacher says : " Dancing is not conducive to a proper learning environment .
#Text=Young people must have rigid discipline and order .
#Text=" Aang says : " But what about expressing yourself ?
#Text=" Music teacher says : " I know sometimes we 're so ruled by our love for our nation that we ca n't control our own bodies .
#Text=If you must , you may march in place quietly next time the urge hits you .
#Text=" On Ji says : " Uh , hi , Kuzon .
#Text=I really liked that crazy dance you were doing .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thanks On Ji .
#Text=I could show it to you again if you like .
#Text=Ah !
#Text=" Hide says : " What 'd you say , colony trash ?
#Text=You 're gon na show her something ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Just some dance movements .
#Text=" Hide says : " Nobody shows my On Ji anything , especially movements !
#Text=" Headmaster says : " Picking fights on your second day ?
#Text=We need to have a conference to discuss your punishment .
#Text=Bring your parents to my office after school .
#Text=" Aang says : " Parents ?
#Text=But - " Headmaster says : " Do n't be late !
#Text=" Headmaster says : " Thank you for coming , Mr. and Mrs ... " Sokka says : " Fire .
#Text=Wang Fire .
#Text=This is my wife , Sapphire .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sapphire Fire .
#Text=Nice to meet you .
#Text=" Headmaster says : " Mr. and Mrs ... Fire , your son has been enrolled here for two days and he 's already causing problems .
#Text=He 's argued with his history teacher , disrupted music class , and roughed up my star pupil .
#Text=" Katara says : " My goodness !
#Text=That does n't sound like our Kuzon .
#Text=" Headmaster says : " That 's what any mother would say , Ma'am .
#Text=Nonetheless , you 're forewarned ; if he acts up one more time , I 'll have him sent to reform school - by which I mean the coal mines .
#Text=Are we clear ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do n't you worry , Mr. Headmaster .
#Text=I 'll straighten this boy out somethin' fierce !
#Text=Young man , as soon as we get home you 're gon na get the punishment of a lifetime !
#Text=" Headmaster says : " That 's what I like to hear .
#Text="
